docs.title: 🔍 Research Overview
docs.text:
• Facial Genomics — Enhancer–TF interactions (DOCK9 / FOXC2) shaping human craniofacial features.
  • Single-Cell Multi-Omics — Developmental trajectories across tissues and species (Human & Cattle).
  • Medical Imaging & AI — CT-based radiomics and deep learning for renal prognosis (ΔeGFR).
  • DOCK9–FOXC2 Regulatory Mechanism

SNP–enhancer functional validation and transcriptional regulation. View Project

  • MedIR Kidney Prognosis (ΔeGFR)

Multi-modal deep learning framework integrating CT and clinical data. Explore

  • Cattle Cross-Tissue Single-Cell Atlas

Transcriptomic integration and cellular landscape across tissues. Open Notes

docs.title: 🧰 Data & Code Resources
docs.text:
• scRNA-seq Integration (Scanpy + Harmony)
  • ATAC-seq Pseudotime Analysis (SnapATAC2)
  • CT Radiomics Feature Selection & LASSO

docs.title: 👤 About
